name: Bodhisattwa Basu
about: Hi! I’m Bodhi, a BCA graduate and currently pursuing Mca, and a frontend developer. I’m passionate about building web applications that are both functional and beautiful. I also have experience working with Next js, Node js, and similar technologies, and I’m always eager to learn more. When I’m not coding, you can find me on the streets photographing people. Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn!
